lead_paragraph: In one of his final acts in office, President Barack Obama selected key figures in sports, entrepreneurship, philanthropy, activism, academia and entertainment among the 21 people who will be awarded the 2016 Presidential Medal of Freedom - the highest civilian honor in the United States.

headline.main: Hanks, Springsteen Among Obama's Last Medal of Freedom Recipients
headline.print_headline: Hanks, Springsteen Among Obama's Last Medal of Freedom Recipients
